reasons_to_visit.details: Music festival events continue into August with additional cultural performances and events.
Excellent weather continues with warm temperatures ideal for all outdoor activities.
August offers optimal conditions for Vltava River rafting with warm weather and stable water levels.
Long summer days provide maximum time for sightseeing and outdoor exploration.
All restaurants, attractions, and services operate at full capacity with extended hours.

reasons_to_avoid.details: August remains extremely busy with large crowds at all major attractions.
Peak season pricing continues with expensive accommodation and dining.
Combination of summer heat and tourist crowds can make sightseeing less comfortable.
Last-minute bookings are nearly impossible for quality accommodations and restaurants.
